channel.title: How to refresh a div using javascript
channel.description:
Hi, i have created a page that has a built in radio player inside a div tag
The problem im having is that sometimes the radio player disconnects and needs a refresh, However i do not want teh whole page to refresh. Just the radio player. How can i refresh this div tag just by using a Javascriot???

item.title: How to refresh a div using javascript
item.dc:creator: @cruel cruel
item.description:
@cruel wrote:

Pwnd:

Or, without having to use ajax… Just have the html for the player already in the html file… You will have to determine when it is disconnected however.

lolwut? I’m assuming he has the player in the html already…
But if you’re wanting a pure html solution, I guess you could try putting the player in its own html file with a meta refresh. Then put that file in an iframe… I just dunno how reliable meta refresh is these days.

Read full topic
item.source: How to refresh a div using javascript
